response.overview: For its second year running, The Malaysia Animation Film Festival 2024 will spotlight homegrown animators with an exciting lineup 2 movies - Homegrown Animated Shorts & Grimoire. MAFF presents an opportunity for audiences to enjoy a diverse range of animated works that reflect the unique voices and artistic prowess of Malaysiaâ€™s storytellers. Grimoire offers an immersive journey through the filmmaker's past works, seamlessly weaving together elements of reality and fiction. Among these works is Horologist, a groundbreaking piece that won Best Animation at both the USA Film Festival and the San Diego Comic-Con Film Festival in 2023, making it the first Malaysian film to achieve such a feat at SDCC.
response.title: MAFF: Grimoire
